gloss: A flat surface, without slope, tilts, or indentations ; a level surface.
A surface without outline ; a flat or almost flat surface.
A flat surface, usually level, with no slope, tilt in it.
A tool with a flat blade for leveling or shaping wood, metal, etc.
A plain, flat, undivided wooden grain.
